effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

short_effect.x_y: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

flavor_text.x_y: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
